title: Benchmarking Music Autotagging with MGPHot Expert Annotations vs. Generic Tag Datasets
summary: This paper introduces a new benchmarking dataset based on the MGPHot dataset, including expert musicological annotations for music autotagging, to evaluate general-purpose music representations.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the paper introduces a "benchmarking dataset" with "expert musicological annotations," which directly relates to the concept of a 'Contextual dataset' for a specific application.
